are using the Planned Parenthood video as a rallying cry. Mike Pence ( R-Ind.) said this week that the video helps make the case for his bill that would strip Planned Parenthood of federal funding. Every American should be shocked that an employee of the largest recipient of federal funds under Title X has been recorded aiding and abetting underage sex trafficking, he said. Mike Pence is also participating in a webcast Thursday night with almost a dozen anti-abortion rights groups to build support for his measure.
